ath.name: free climber
ath.text: When climbing or falling, treat it as though it were half as high.

ath.name: gymnast
ath.text: If you aren't Restricted or in a choke point, add your athletics score to combat.

ath.name: parkour
ath.text: You can climb up to AGI+athletics metres in one round. You can wall run twice as far as you can long jump, and you can wall jump twice as high as you can high jump.

ath.name: rider
ath.text: Your steed gets +1 to AGI checks.

ath.name: sprint
ath.text: If you have no Fatigue, take +3 to athletics and fight checks ueor and take 1 Fatigue aeor.

ath.name: warm up
ath.text: Whenever you do an athletics check during battle, get +1 athletics ueob.
